title: Got LEAVER REMAKE when my game froze my computer i had to restart my computer, game loaded in, then
body: FROZE and it counts as a loss, remake should be no one loses lp unless the game starts, i mean remake wth guys come on i didnt even leave spawn and game crashed .... kinda dissapointing as i never try to feed and lose lp like this so close to demotion really upsetting

replies.body: It sounds like you're freezing anytime you join a match.  It sucks that's happening and while we can't change game stats, I'd like to help.  Are you on Windows 10?  An update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been causing freezes like this.  Disable that for the fix, but test it in a custom game to be sure in order to prevent further penalties.  Let me know if it helps!
LMAO i love your name so much
how do i disable it lol, and yes i do have that! thank you for responding, one good thing from tilting all day i finally get a response!
